data.text:
Eh？……do a mock race, right now？ Comin' all the way out to the Oi 
racetrack……and to top it off, in front of a crowd！
data.name: Inari One

data.text:
Ufufu, Inari-chan！！ 
The Chief told us, so we came to watch～！！
data.name: Townsfolk

data.text:
Well, aren't they lively？ The ones you're facin', 
just like you, they're all plannin' on joinin' me. 
Now's as good a time as ever to face off, right？
data.name: Chief

data.text:
Ain't that too sudden！？ 
But, well, I'll do it if the Chief says so……！
data.name: Inari One

data.text: Yeah, please do. ……Alright, go get changed.
data.name: Chief

data.text:
Seems like the 『Race』 the Chief wanted me to see……was this one, a 
mock race between Inari One and the newer team members.

Taking a look around, it looks like the Chief had called out 
several people from the town. The soba stall old lady, that 
shopkeeper from the festival, and even that boss cat……
With everyone in high-spirits looking on――the race began.

(A mock race with the Uma Musume who joined recently……
I get it, but isn't it too soon？ Besides, why would 
ya tell me only on the day of？ Hmmmmm……)
data.name: Inari One

data.text: Haa, haa, haa, haa……！
data.name: Purple Scrunchie Uma Musume

data.text:
(――can't get distracted, I need to focus！ She's runnin' 
energetically, but she should be runnin' out of stamina soon, 
right？ I'll make my move……！)
data.name: Inari One

data.text: Uu……oOOOOOOOOOH！！
data.name: Purple Scrunchie Uma Musume

data.text: (！？ She's not……fallin' behind！？)
data.name: Inari One

data.text: I…… ran out of stamina again, and got 5th though……
data.name: Purple Scrunchie Uma Musume

data.text:
Zeee haaa haaa haaa…… 
GaaAAAAAAAAA！！
data.name: Purple Scrunchie Uma Musume

data.text:
(Hey hey！ This girl…… she's completely 
different from before, ain't she！？)
data.name: Inari One

data.text: Kuu……！ Come, onnnnn！！
data.name: Inari One

data.text:
Guuuuuuu……！ 
Not yet……not yet, not yet, not yeeeeeeeeeet！！
data.name: Purple Scrunchie Uma Musume

data.text:
Surprisingly, it looked like Inari One was being overwhelmed！ 
With 200m left, at this rate……！
The moment I thought that――
DeeEEEEERyaaAAAAAAAーーー！！
data.name: Inari One

data.text:
Until the very last moment she was just one step 
behind, but―― At the end, narrowly by a nose, Inari 
One was able to pull ahead and take first……
Zeee, haaa, haaa, haaa！！
data.name: Inari and Others

data.text:
Naaaaaaaaa, daaaaaaamnitーーー！！ 
I lostーーーー！！！
data.name: Purple Scrunchie Uma Musume

data.text:
Haaa, haaa……N-no, but……
you, when did ya……make it this far……！？
data.name: Inari One

data.text: It was close. But, well――do ya get it now, Inari？
data.name: Chief

data.text:
I don't need somethin' like you payin' back 
your debts. Even without ya―― this place, has 
youngsters like her who will support it.
data.name: Chief

data.text:
！？ Eh……Chief！！ What the heck are ya sayin' all of a sudden！？ 
I'll be at the Chief's place, and enter Oi races――
data.name: Inari One

data.text:
What are ya sayin', ya moron！？ ……Do ya think I haven't noticed？ 
It's obvious ya had a change of heart.
data.name: Chief

data.text:
Ya want to go to Tracen Academy, don't ya？ 
Stop doin' somethin' miserable like bottlin' it up and bearin' it.
data.name: Chief

data.text:
If you're an Edo kid from the rough side of town！ Go to the big 
stage of the Twinkle Series, stir it up, and make some big waves！！
data.name: Chief

data.text:
……！
C……Chief……！！
data.name: Inari One

data.text:
That's right！ If it's for Inari-chan, 
I'll go wherever to cheer her on！！
data.name: Soba-stand Old Lady

data.text:
The Edo Kid, Inari has arrived！ 
On that big stage, go knock their socks off！！
data.name: Shopkeeper Old Man

data.text:
WaaAAAAAAA！！ 
Inari！ Inari！ Inari！ Inari！
data.name: Townsfolk

data.text: Everyone……
data.name: Inari One

data.text:
……Hmph, what's with that mopey look on your face？ 
C'mon, get goin' already！
data.name: Chief

data.text:
You've already got a partner, don't ya？ That race 
just now……the reason ya could pull through at the 
end, it's not like ya haven't realized it.
data.name: Chief

data.text:
Chief……Yeah. 
……Yeah, I got it！！
data.name: Inari One

data.text: And so――several weeks later.
Hey hey hey hey. I'm comin' in！！
data.name: Inari One

data.text:
A workin' class girl, from a workin' class town！！ 
And now a student at Tracen Academy, the Edo 
Kid, Inari, refers to me！！……ya see！？
data.name: Inari One

choices.text: Inari One……！ I was waiting for you！！
choices.processed: <size=41>Inari One……！ I was waiting for you！！</size>

data.text:
Just Inari is fine, let's keep it casual. Since, from now on, 
we're gonna be on the same long～road together. Right, Boss！？
data.name: Inari One

choices.text: Yeah！ We'll take on the world, Inari！
choices.processed: <size=43>Yeah！ We'll take on the world, Inari！</size>

choices.text: Yeah！ We'll take on the world, Inari！
choices.processed: <size=43>Yeah！ We'll take on the world, Inari！</size>

data.text:
Just Inari is fine, let's keep it casual. Since, from now on, 
we're gonna be on the same long～road together. Right, Boss！？
data.name: Inari One

choices.text: Yeah！ We'll take on the world, Inari！
choices.processed: <size=43>Yeah！ We'll take on the world, Inari！</size>

choices.text: Yeah！ We'll take on the world, Inari！
choices.processed: <size=43>Yeah！ We'll take on the world, Inari！</size>

data.text:
That's what I'm talkin' about！！ Alright――once more, I'm here from 
Oi to stir things up at the Twinkle Series！！
data.name: Inari One
